Key Match Events: Rohit Sharma and Virat Kohli scored quickly at the start of India's innings.
Hardik Pandya hit a half-century to see India home.
Bangladesh's chase was hindered by key dismissals and couldn't match India's total.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was a crucial one for both teams in the Super Eights phase of the T20 World Cup.
India continued their unbeaten run with a dominant performance.
